entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning this afternoon then changing to snow later this afternoon. Fog patches developing this morning and dissipating this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm south of Green Bay. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
